name: Pigolition Derby
description:
Demolition Derby featuring Pig riders! Pick the arena. Choose your Pig and seat the rider.
Step into the arena and get ready for animal-farm mayhem! Aim, charge, and hit your
opponent’s weak spots to destroy them and claim victory!
